dialog-shepherd-start2.name: %Shepherd%
messages:
I was supposed to be watching the sheep,
but I took a quick nap, and the next thing
I know... they were all over the place.

dialog-shepherd-start3.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
How did they get out?
The fence looks fine.

dialog-shepherd-start3.name: %Shepherd%
messages:
I don't even know.
Maybe they were, you know, hacked out.
By the big bad.

dialog-shepherd-start3.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
But the big bad hasn't been around
for years. Just how long was this nap?

dialog-shepherd-start3.name: %Shepherd%
messages:
It was the shortest nap.
Super quick. It was a long blink, really.

I really need this job, man.
My last trip to Pigeon-Con, I spent all my
rent money on merch.

Can you just help me out?
Get them back inside somehow?

dialog-shepherd-start-s.name: %Shepherd%
messages:
Can you help a dude out?
Put all four sheep back inside the fence?

dialog-shepherd-end.name: %Shepherd%
messages: Thanks a million! I owe you one!
